TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriTemplate extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表統一資源識別元 (URI) 樣板的類別。

span.span: A class that represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 樣板可讓您定義一組結構類似的 URI。A URI template allows you to define a set of structurally similar URIs. 樣板中則包含兩個部分：路徑和查詢。Templates are composed of two parts, a path and a query. 路徑則包含一系列以斜線 (/) 分隔的區段。A path consists of a series of segments delimited by a slash (/). 每個區段都有常值、變數值 (寫在大括號 [{ }] 內，限制為完全符合某個區段的內容) 或必須出現在路徑結尾的萬用字元 (以星號 [\*] 表示，會符合路徑其餘部分)。Each segment can have a literal value, a variable value (written within curly braces [{ }], constrained to match the contents of exactly one segment), or a wildcard (written as an asterisk [\*], which matches "the rest of the path"), which must appear at the end of the path. 可以完全省略查詢運算式。The query expression can be omitted entirely. 如果出現，會指定一系列非循序的名稱/值組。If present, it specifies an unordered series of name/value pairs. 查詢運算式的項目可以是常值組 (?x=2) 或變數組 (?x={val})。Elements of the query expression can be either literal pairs (?x=2) or variable pairs (?x={val}). 不允許使用未成對的值。Unpaired values are not permitted. 下列範例將顯示有效的樣板字串：The following examples show valid template strings: - "weather/WA/Seattle""weather/WA/Seattle" - "weather/{state}/{city}""weather/{state}/{city}" - "weather/\*""weather/\*" - "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast=today"weather/{state}/{city}?forecast=today - "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast={day}"weather/{state}/{city}?forecast={day} 前面的 URI 樣板可能會用於組織氣象報告。The preceding URI templates might be used for organizing weather reports. 包含在大括號中的區段是變數，其餘都是常值。Segments enclosed in curly braces are variables, everything else is a literal. 您可以將變數取代成實際值，將 執行個體轉換成 。You can convert a instance into a by replacing variables with actual values. 例如，採用樣板 "weather/{state}/{city}"，並為變數 "{state}" 和 "{city}" 置入值，將會產生 "weather/WA/Seattle"。For example, taking the template "weather/{state}/{city}" and putting in values for the variables "{state}" and "{city}" gives you "weather/WA/Seattle". 獲得指定的候選 URI 後，您便可以藉由呼叫 ，測試它是否符合指定的 URI 樣板。Given a candidate URI, you can test whether it matches a given URI template by calling . 您也可以呼叫 或 ，以便使用 執行個體，從一組變數值建立 。You can also use instances to create a from a set of variable values by calling or . ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何建立 執行個體，然後繫結至候選 URI 並加以比對。The following code demonstrates how to create a instance, and bind and match it to a candidate URI. [!code-csharp[UriTemplate#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/cs/snippets.cs#0)] [!code-vb[UriTemplate#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/vb/snippets.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `ignoreTrailingSlash` 設定為 `true`，在比對候選 URI 時，會忽略樣板尾端的結尾斜線。When the `ignoreTrailingSlash` is set to `true`, trailing slashes on the end of template are ignored when matching a candidate URI. 比方說，這類範本 」http://www.microsoft.com/customer/"會比對下列候選 Uri:For example, a template such as "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/" would match the following candidate URIs: - "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/""http://www.microsoft.com/customer/" - "http://www.microsoft.com/customer""http://www.microsoft.com/customer" - "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/?wsdl""http://www.microsoft.com/customer/?wsdl" - "http://www.microsoft.com/customer?wsdl""http://www.microsoft.com/customer?wsdl"

span.span: The base address.

summary.span: 從範本和參數集合建立新的 URI。

span.span: Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
A URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [IDictionary\<字串，字串 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602)參數包含參數名稱 / 值組的集合。The [IDictionary\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602) parameter contains a collection of parameter name and value pairs. 參數與樣板內的變數會以不區分大小寫方式進行比對。The parameters are matched up against the variables within the template by a case-insensitive comparison. > [!NOTE] > 傳遞至這個方法的名稱/值集合必須包含每個樣板變數的索引鍵。The name/value collection passed to this method must contain a key for every template variable. 不符合樣板變數的額外名稱/值組會附加至最終 URI 的查詢字串。Extra name/value pairs that do not match template variables are appended to the query string of the final URI. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您可以在名稱/值組內傳入文字，名稱/值組不會使所產生的 URI 與用於產生它的樣板相符。It is possible to pass in text within the name/value pairs that prevent the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it. 這類文字的範例包括：'/'、'..'、'\*'、'{' 和 '}'。Examples of such text includes: '/', '..', '\*', '{', and '}'.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數，其中包含參數名稱/值組的集合。The parameter contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs. 參數與樣板內的變數會以不區分大小寫方式進行比對。The parameters are matched up against the variables within the template by a case-insensitive comparison. 傳到這個集合中的值會逸出。Values passed in this collection are escaped. > [!NOTE] > 傳遞至 的名稱/值集合必須包含每個樣板變數的索引鍵。The name/value collection passed to must contain a key for every template variable. 不符合樣板變數的額外名稱/值組會附加至最終 URI 的查詢字串。Extra name/value pairs that do not match template variables are appended to the query string of the final URI. > [!NOTE] > 您可以在名稱/值組內傳入文字，名稱/值組不會使所產生的 URI 與用於產生它的樣板相符。It is possible to pass in text within the name/value pairs that prevent the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it. 這類文字的範例包括：'/'、'..'、'\*'、'{' 和 '}'。Examples of such text includes: '/', '..', '\*', '{', and '}'. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example shows how to call the method. The parameter values.

summary.span: 從此樣板和參數值的陣列建立新的 URI。

span.span: Creates a new URI from the template and an array of parameter values.
A new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數值會依位置由左到右進行繫結。The parameter values are bound by position left to right. 第一個參數值會取代在樣板中找到的第一個變數，第二個參數值會取代第二個變數，依此類推。The first parameter value replaces the first variable found in the template, the second parameter value replaces the second variable, and so on. 傳遞至這個方法的變數會逸出。Variables passed to this method are escaped. > [!NOTE] > 傳入值參數中的參數數目必須符合樣板中變數的數目。The number of parameters passed in the values parameter must match the number of variables in the template. 否則會擲回 。If not, a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 您可以在參數值陣列內傳入文字，參數值陣列不會使所產生的 URI 與用於產生它的樣板相符。It is possible to pass in text within the parameter values array that prevents the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it. 這類文字的範例包括：'/'、'.'、'..'、'\*'、'{' 和 '}'。Examples of such text includes: '/', '.','..', '\*', '{', and '}'. 下列程式碼可示範這項處理。The following code demonstrates this. `UriTemplate template = new UriTemplate("far/{bat}/baz");` `Uri uri = new Uri("http://localhost/Base");` `Uri result = template.BindByPosition(uri, "."); // returns Base/form/baz` `Uri result = template.BindByPosition(uri, ".."); // returns Base/baz` `Uri result = template.BindByPosition(uri, "x/y"); // returns Base/form/x/y/baz` `Uri result = template.BindByPosition(uri, "{x}"); // returns Base/form/{x}/baz` `Uri result = template.BindByPosition(uri, "*"); // returns Base/form/*/baz` ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何呼叫 。The following example shows how to call the . [!code-csharp[UriTemplate#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/cs/snippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UriTemplate#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/vb/snippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這兩個 執行個體的常值字串完全相同，而且這些變數出現在相同的區段中，它們就是相等的。Two instances are equivalent if their literal strings are identical and the variables appear in the same segments. 例如，"weather/{state}/{city}" 相等於 "weather/{country}/{village}"。For example "weather/{state}/{city}" is equivalent to "weather/{country}/{village}". ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何呼叫 。The following example shows how to call the . [!code-csharp[UriTemplate#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/cs/snippets.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UriTemplate#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplate/vb/snippets.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果比對成功， 會從填入候選 URI 的 URI 區段、變數值、查詢字串值和萬用字元區段。If the match is successful the is populated with the URI segments, variable values, query string values, and wildcard segments from the candidate URI. 如果比對不成功，則會傳回 `null`。If the match is unsuccessful, `null` is returned. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example shows how to call the method.
